translations: 魅力；魔法；迷人的美（等于 glamour）
迷惑；使有魅力（等于 glamour）

sentences.sentence: This is a club design by the company blacksheep, this is straight glamor out of a hip hop.
sentences.translation: 黑羊公司设计的这间俱乐部，声名在外，不同凡响 。

sentences.sentence: This is the power of glamor of debate!
sentences.translation: 这就是辩论的力量和魅力！

sentences.sentence: Or asking everyone to strike their best glamor pose.
sentences.translation: 或者是请大家尽力摆出他们最魅人的pose。
